radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple osteochondromas detected, including a tibiofibular osteochondroma on the proximal side of the right knee, a large chondrosarcoma on the left iliopubic bone, left and right humeral osteochondromas, Madelung deformities in both radii, and multiple tiny phalangeal osteochondromas.
Demonstrated an iliac mass in the left iliopubic bone with a heterogeneous signal, limb and pelvic compromise.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesion behaved clinically as a chondrosarcoma and recurred after resection.
